title: Kyoukasho no Koibito
sinopse:
Only energy can replace Oohira Kensuke most important lucky charm-it's a picture of a warrior from the Textbook! Kensuke has been going out with a lover for six months, Sakaki Keiichirou. The most popular man in the company, Keiichirou's real identity is!?

(Source: Attractive Fascinante)
